content: To register, enter your email address and click Send request. A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display instructions on how to complete the registration process after listing domains. It appears in a modal dialog and provides guidance on sending a request and receiving activation confirmation via email.

usage.context:
<ModalDialog.Header>{t("RegisterTitle")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialogContainer>
 <Text key="text-body" isBold={false} fontSize="13px" noSelect>
 {getDomainsBlock()}
 {t("RegisterTextBodyAfterDomainsList")}
 </Text>
 
 <FieldContainer
 className="email-reg-field"
 key="e-mail"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "click Send request" is not accurately translated. The Azerbaijani translation "Sorğunu göndər düyməsinə basın" literally means "Press the Send request button." It's more natural to say something like "Sorğunu göndər" (Send the request) or "Göndər düyməsinə vurun" (Click the Send button).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qeydiyyatdan keçmək üçün, elektron poçt ünvanını daxil edin və Göndər düyməsinə vurun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions sending a message with a link to activate the account. This crucial information is missing from the Azerbaijani translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qeydiyyatdan keçmək üçün, elektron poçt ünvanını daxil edin və Sorğunu göndər düyməsinə basın. Aktivlaşdırma linki ilə mesaj sizin elektron poçt ünvanınıza göndəriləcəkdir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address." is not fully conveyed in the Bulgarian translation. It misses the phrase 'activate your account'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За да се регистрирате, въведете имейла си и натиснете Изпрати заявка. Връзка за активация на Вашия акаунт ще Ви бъде изпратена.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Ви' (formal you) which may not be appropriate depending on the target audience. Consider using 'те' (informal you) or an impersonal construction for a more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'твоя акаунт' instead of 'Вашия акаунт' for a more informal tone or reformulate to avoid the direct 'your' pronoun (e.g., 'ще Ви бъде изпратена връзка за активиране на акаунт').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation misses the phrase "A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address." The phrase "Bude vám zaslán aktivační odkaz" is too brief and doesn't fully convey the meaning of the original English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro registraci zadejte svůj e-mail a klikněte na tlačítko Odeslat žádost. Na zadanou adresu bude odeslán e-mail s odkazem pro aktivaci účtu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation lacks the word 'tlačítko' before 'Odeslat žádost', making it less clear.  While understandable, it's more natural to include it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro registraci zadejte svůj e-mail a klikněte na tlačítko Odeslat žádost.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Send request' is not the most natural translation of 'click Send request' in this context. A more common and accurate phrasing would be 'Klicken Sie auf Senden'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Für Registrierung geben Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse ein und klicken Sie auf Senden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'an dieser Adresse' (at this address) is technically correct but not the most fluent or natural choice. 'An diese Adresse' or 'An die angegebene Adresse' would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Für Registrierung geben Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse ein und klicken Sie auf Senden. Der Link zur Aktivierung Ihres Kontos wird an diese Adresse/An die angegebene Adresse gesendet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'click Send request' is not accurately translated. 'Αποστολή αιτήματος' translates to 'Send request' but the instruction to 'click' is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για να εγγραφείτε, πληκτρολογήστε το email σας και κάντε κλικ στο κουμπί 'Αποστολή αιτήματος'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'a link to activate your account' is implied, but the word 'activation' is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για να εγγραφείτε, πληκτρολογήστε το email σας και κάντε κλικ στο κουμπί 'Αποστολή αιτήματος'. Εκεί θα σας αποσταλεί ένας σύνδεσμος ενεργοποίησης λογαριασμού.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'click Send request' is not accurately translated. 'Enviar solicitud' translates to 'submit request', not 'send request'. The original English implies an action the user takes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para registrarse, introduzca su email y haga clic en Enviar. (To register, enter your email and click Send.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English states 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.' This crucial detail about the message's purpose is missing in the Spanish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para registrarse, introduzca su email y haga clic en Enviar. Se le enviará un mensaje con un enlace para activar su cuenta a la dirección especificada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Se le enviará' is grammatically correct, it's slightly formal. A more conversational tone might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Recibirá un mensaje con un enlace...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation is missing the phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.' from the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rekisteröidy kirjoittamalla sähköpostiosoitteesi ja napsauttamalla Lähetä pyyntö. Sinulle lähetetään aktivointilinkki sähköpostiosoitteeseesi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The final sentence is not grammatically complete. It lacks the subject/recipient of the link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rekisteröidy kirjoittamalla sähköpostiosoitteesi ja napsauttamalla Lähetä pyyntö. Aktivointilinkki lähetetään sinulle sähköpostitse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Ուղարկել հայցումը" is an unusual and potentially inaccurate translation of "Send request". It implies sending a request *to* someone, rather than sending an email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ուղարկել գրանցման հաղորդագրությունը (Send the registration message) or Ուղարկել էլ.փոստը (Send the email)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks consistency in formality. While using 'Ձեր' is formal, the rest of the sentence uses a less formal tone. Consider maintaining consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Գրանցվելու համար մուտքագրեք ձեր էլ.փոստը և սեղմեք Ուղարկել հայցումը: Ձեզ կուղարկվի ակտիվացման հղում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Inviare la richiesta' is a bit clunky. 'Invia richiesta' would be more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per registrarti, inserisci la tua email e clicca su Invia richiesta. Un messaggio con un link per attivare il tuo account verrà inviato all'indirizzo specificato.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "A message with a link to activate your account will be sent" is too literal. A more natural Japanese phrasing would be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: アカウント有効化のためのリンクが記載されたメッセージが送信されます (akaunto yūkouse no tame no rinku ga kishō sareta messēji ga sōshin sa remasu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of quotation marks around "リクエスト送信" is potentially unnecessary and not always standard in Japanese for this context. It depends on the specific UI design.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 「リクエスト送信」をクリックします -> リクエスト送信をクリックします

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation '가입하시려면, 이메일을 입력한 뒤 가입 요청을 클릭하세요. 활성화 링크가 전송됩니다.' lacks the specificity of 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.' It only mentions sending an activation link, not that it's within a message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 가입하시려면, 이메일을 입력한 뒤 가입 요청을 클릭하세요. 계정 활성화를 위한 링크가 포함된 메시지가 지정된 주소로 전송됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a strict error, the use of '활성화 링크가 전송됩니다' feels slightly abrupt. A more natural flow might incorporate the receiver.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 활성화 링크가 귀하에게 전송됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "A message with a link to activate your account" is not accurately translated. "ລິງຂໍເປີດໃຊ້ງານ" translates to "link to open use" which doesn't convey the intended meaning of activating an account.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງເພື່ອເປີດໃຊ້ບັນຊີຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. "ລິ້ງຂໍເປີດໃຊ້ງານຈະສົ່ງຫາທ່ານຜ່ານທາງອີເມວ" is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານຈະໄດ້ຮັບອີເມວທີ່ມີລິ້ງເພື່ອເປີດໃຊ້ງານບັນຊີຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content mentions sending a message with a link to activate the account to the specified email address. This is missing from the Latvian translation. The phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address' is absent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai reģistrētos, ievadiet savu e-pastu un noklikšķiniet uz Sūtīt pieprasījumu. Jums tiks nosūtīta aktivizācijas saite uz norādīto e-pastu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Sūtīt pieprasījumu' is acceptable, a more natural translation for 'click Send request' would be 'noklikšķiniet uz pogas Sūtīt' or similar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai reģistrētos, ievadiet savu e-pastu un noklikšķiniet uz pogas Sūtīt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation is missing the phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.' The sentence is cut off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Om te registreren, voert u uw e-mail in en klikt u op Stuur verzoek. U ontvangt een e-mail met een activatielink naar het opgegeven adres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation lacks a period at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Om te registreren, voert u uw e-mail in en klikt u op Stuur verzoek. U ontvangt een e-mail met een activatielink naar het opgegeven adres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Send request' is translated as 'Wyślij wniosek'. While understandable, a more natural and common phrasing in Polish would be 'Wyślij prośbę' or 'Wyślij zapytanie'. 'Wniosek' implies a more formal application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyślij prośbę

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'specified address' is translated as 'wskazany przez Ciebie adres'. While grammatically correct, a simpler and more direct translation like 'ten adres' or 'podany adres' might be preferable for clarity and conciseness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ten adres

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "click Send request" is not accurately translated. 'Send request' implies an action initiated by the user, while the English phrasing is more passive (clicking a button).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para registar-se, introduza o seu e-mail e clique no botão 'Enviar'. (To register, enter your email and click the 'Send' button.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address' is incomplete. It does not convey that the link is for account activation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ser-lhe-á enviado um e-mail com um link para ativar a sua conta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the clarity of the original sentence structure regarding the passive voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ser-lhe-á enviado um e-mail com um link para ativar a sua conta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address' is not accurately translated. The current translation 'Um link de ativação será enviado a você' is too short and doesn't convey the full meaning. It misses the part about the message containing the link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um e-mail com um link para ativar sua conta será enviado para o endereço fornecido.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation lacks clarity and flow.  'Um link de ativação será enviado a você' sounds a bit abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um e-mail com um link de ativação será enviado para o endereço fornecido.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Veți primi o scrisoare de activare' misses the crucial part of the English content - 'click Send request' and 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address'.  It only mentions receiving a letter of activation, not the action of sending a request or the link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a vă înregistra, introduceți adresa de e-mail și dați clic pe Trimite solicitarea. Veți primi un e-mail cu un link pentru a vă activa contul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'click Send request' is not accurately translated. 'ඉල්ලීම යවන්න මත ඔබන්න' is awkward. A more natural translation would convey the action of sending the request.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ඉල්ලීම යවන්න මත ඔබන්න' with something like 'ඉල්ලුම යවන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'activate' is not directly translated in the Sinhala text. While understandable, a more direct equivalent could improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'සක්‍රිය කිරීමට' with 'පහසු කිරීම'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be broken down for better readability in Sinhala.  Consider splitting into two sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Split the first sentence: 'ලියාපදිංචි වීමට, ඔබගේ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනය ඇතුල් කර ඉල්ලීම යවන්න මත ඔබන්න.' into 'ලියාපදිංචි වීමට, ඔබගේ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනය ඇතුල් කර ඉල්ලීම යවන්න.' and 'ඉල්ලීම යවන්න මත ඔබන්න.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation is missing the phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.' from the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak sa chcete zaregistrovať, zadajte svoj e-mail a kliknite na tlačidlo Poslať žiadosť. Na zadanú adresu bude zaslané aktivačné prepojenie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Bude vám zaslané aktivačné prepojenie' is a bit abrupt. A slight adjustment improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bude vám zaslané aktivačné prepojenie na zadanú adresu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation is missing the phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address.'  It's a crucial part of the original English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Za registracijo vnesite svoj e-mail naslov in kliknite Pošlji zahtevo. Sporočilo s povezavo za aktivacijo vašega računa bo poslana na naveden naslov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses 'poslana'. It is grammatically correct but stylistically a bit awkward. It should be 'bo poslana'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Za registracijo vnesite svoj e-mail naslov in kliknite Pošlji zahtevo. Sporočilo s povezavo za aktivacijo vašega računa bo poslana na naveden naslov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "емаил" is a transliteration of 'email' and is often replaced with the more common Serbian word "e-mail".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: е-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, in Serbian, it is common to use a hyphen after the 'e' in 'e-mail' for better readability. The current translation lacks this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: е-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'email' is misspelled as 'email'. It should be 'e-mail'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'biće poslata' is grammatically awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'biće poslata'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: biće poslata

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent to the specified address' is not fully captured in the Turkish translation. It's more literal than conveys the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kayıt olmak için e-postanızı girin ve Talep gönder'e tıklayın. Belirtilen adrese aktivasyon bağlantısı içeren bir e-posta gönderilecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Talep gönder' directly, which might be too literal and less user-friendly than a more conversational call to action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kayıt olmak için e-postanızı girin ve 'Kaydol' veya 'E-posta Gönder' gibi daha kullanıcı dostu bir butona tıklayın. Belirtilen adrese aktivasyon bağlantısı içeren bir e-posta gönderilecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation misses the crucial detail that the user needs to click the 'Send request' button. It only mentions clicking something.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để đăng ký, hãy nhập email của bạn và nhấp vào Gửi yêu cầu. Một liên kết kích hoạt tài khoản sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email bạn đã cung cấp.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Liên kết kích hoạt sẽ được gửi đến bạn' is a bit ambiguous. It doesn't explicitly state that the link is for account activation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Một liên kết kích hoạt tài khoản sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email bạn đã cung cấp.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly wrong, using 'địa chỉ email bạn đã cung cấp' clarifies the context. The original translation is understandable, but less precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để đăng ký, hãy nhập email của bạn và nhấp vào Gửi yêu cầu. Một liên kết kích hoạt tài khoản sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email bạn đã cung cấp.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'click Send request' is a bit literal. A more natural Chinese phrasing would be '点击注册' or '点击提交'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 点击注册

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'A message with a link to activate your account will be sent' is a bit clunky. A more natural flow would be '激活账户的链接将会发送到您指定的邮箱'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 激活账户的链接将会发送到您指定的邮箱
